title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush. Trump calls out Pentagon leaders who seek war as unsourced hit piece in The Atlantic rocks election. Biden reads teleprompter answers live. Victor Davis Hanson thought race would dissolve as an issue as people intermarry, but it's the opposite. Byron York on the left's crazy "coup porn." Rush: Trump is anti-war. Do you even remember the name of the men who signed off on the Afghan war 20 years ago? Dr. Fauci funny: No white masks after Labor Day.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Mark's Canadian quip is COVID casualty as border traps people on either side. Mark can't wait for Rush to be back mocking the guest hosts. Republicans have to win beyond the margin of lawyer. So much for the "knowledge economy," as we're totally dependent on China for our laptops, cellphones, pharmaceutical, and everything else. Under Biden, it'll be China's world and we'll just live in it. Hunter Biden is owned by China. Is Dole-Mondale a warning for Trump-Biden? Cuomo says Trump created the pandemic in New York by not banning travel from Europe sooner. City life is dead as people flee to the country and suburbs. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Something is going on out there. Democrats will not allow a repeat of their 2016 Election Night. Zuckerberg: Media has to persuade Americans to accept that there's nothing unusual about it taking weeks to decide the election. Who the heck appointed the head of Facebook to decide what elections are legitimate? Campaign 2020. If we go to war with China, American taxpayers will pay for both sides. Democrats think the pandemic works for them. Lefties target your lawn for "decolonization," say keeping it neat is bigoted.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
